p: Dengue notification data (by clinical evaluation, not molecularly confirmed) were obtained from the Brazilian ministry of health, available at the TABNET webportal. These notification data included the total number of dengue cases per month, per year, over the period 2007–2012 for the main municipality of each city. The data used are made available on Figshare https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.c.4485503 (Louren¸co, 2019).
